trans-unit.source: Provides a XAML-friendly implementation of a <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter" /> that filters on a single action.
trans-unit.target: 단일 동작에서 필터링하는 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.Dispatcher.MessageFilter" />에 대한 XAML 친화형 구현을 제공합니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> class.
Gets or sets the action for the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
The action for the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
The <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> to compare with the current <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> is equal to the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.

<see langword="true" /> if the specified <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> is equal to the current <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 <see langword="true" />가 현재<see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />와 같으면 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> 이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> instance.
The hash code for the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" /> instance.

Determines whether a message’s action matches the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action" /> of this <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
A message’s action is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> property of the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.
The message to compare.

Determines whether the specified message’s action matches the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action" /> of this <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 메시지의 동작이 이 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action" />의 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />과 일치하는지 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the action matches; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 작업이 일치하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A message’s action is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> property of the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.
The message buffer that contains the message to compare.
trans-unit.target: 비교할 메시지가 들어 있는 메시지 버퍼입니다.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the action of the message contained by the specified message buffer matches the <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action" /> of this <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 메시지 버퍼에 포함된 메시지의 동작이 이 <see cref="P:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action" />의 <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />과 일치하는지 확인합니다.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the action matches; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 작업이 일치하면 <see langword="true" />이고, 그렇지 않으면 <see langword="false" />입니다.

trans-unit.source: A message’s action is specified by the <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.MessageHeaders.Action%2A> property of the message’s <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.Message.Headers%2A>.
Returns a <see cref="T:System.String" /> representation of the <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.
The current <see cref="T:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter" />.

If the <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A> property is set, its value is used to build the string representation; otherwise, the base class <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> value is returned.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.CorrelationActionMessageFilter.Action%2A> 속성이 설정되어 있으면 해당 값이 문자열 표현을 만드는 데 사용되고, 그렇지 않으면 기본 클래스 <xref:System.Object.ToString%2A> 값이 반환됩니다.
